about_the_game:
Execute the following file to start DLC.
C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\HENTAI SEEK\hentaiseek_hentaibook\Game.exe

This DLC can get hentaibook in bonus stage.
There are 23 pages in total.
Maid girls have hidden secrets.
With translation.
English (en), Korean (ko), Chinese (Traditional: zh-TW), Russian (ru)
German (de), Chinese (simplified: zh), French (fr), Portuguese (Brazil: pt-BR)

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This DLC can get hentaibook in bonus stage.
supported_languages: Japanese, English, French, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
